response.original_title: How do I get a TotalAV refund?➥ US-1-855-535-4580
response.overview: ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 If you recently purchased a TotalAV subscription and want to request your money back under the official money-back guarantee policy, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 the first step is to log into your TotalAV account dashboard using your registered email address and password so you can review your billing history and subscription status, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 then navigate to the Billing or My Services section to confirm your purchase date and refund eligibility window, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 because refund approval typically depends on whether your request falls within the allowed guarantee period, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 and if you are unsure about the timeline or see unexpected renewal charges, contacting customer assistance can provide real-time clarification, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 especially if you want to avoid additional automatic billing cycles in the future.
